title: IncrediMail 2 Premium 6.29 Build 5203 Final + IncrediBackup
description:
IncrediMail is an advanced e-mail client that offers you an unprecedented interactive experience. With IncrediMail you can personalize your e-mail according to your mood and personality. Unique multimedia features will enable you to tailor your email experience so that it fits your mood and personality. Visual effects will entertain your every sense.
Choose from an assortment of e-mail backgrounds, animations, sounds, 3D effects, emoticons, dancing letters, random notifier selection, improved style box navigation, enahnced editing capabilities and e-cards and make them all become part of your e-mail.
